entry.title: Bitcoin 0.4.0 released
entry.summary: The request is for secure file checksums to be posted somewhere other than Sourceforge. The individual making the request specifies that the checksums should be GPG-signed, but does not provide any reasoning behind the desire to avoid using Sourceforge. Another user responds with a question, wondering what difference it would make if the checksums were GPG-signed regardless of where they were posted.
